name: It's Dark (itch)
description:
It's dark is a black and white horror game made in Unity in 5 days for Sykoo's Elite Devs game jam.

There is 4 modes:

2 are memes

2 are very scary modes

In "Looking for candies" you will need to escape from forest zombie and collect 5 chocolate bars.

In "S.A.M - The Dab" you will need to collect 5 dab pictures and escape from Pirate Sykoo!

In "Corintiano The Five Mundials" you will need to collect 5 mundials, but there is Maurin trying to get back the mundials.

And the other one is secret
